Health, Hygiene & Clean Energy

By Aikya Seva Centre

Through a mix of medical access, clean water, nutrition, and sustainable cooking solutions, Aikya empowers healthier, happier, and safer village communities.

Mobile Clinics and Local Access

On Wheels, With Care

Our mobile clinics visit remote villages weekly, providing basic checkups, women’s health care, and medication. Villagers no longer need to walk miles to cities for basic treatment.

Safe Drinking Water

Access to pure water improves immunity and reduces disease. We installed community-level RO filtration systems to serve hundreds daily.

RO filtration units serving clean, mineral-rich water to entire villages

Organic Kitchen Gardens

Grow Healthy, Stay Healthy

We trained rural households, especially women, to grow organic vegetables at home — ensuring year-round nutrition and reducing dependency on markets.

Clean Cooking Energy

Traditional chulhas cause smoke-related illnesses. We distributed smokeless chulhas and promoted biogas adoption — safer for lungs and better for the planet.

Biogas and chulhas: cooking without tears, cough, or fuel worries

Real Impact, Real People

  • Over 3,000 villagers benefit from water and health programs
  • Women-led gardens reduced monthly vegetable costs
  • 80% drop in smoke-related complaints in chulha households
  • Mobile clinics reduced travel time to hospitals by 60%

Health is a foundation. We don’t treat symptoms — we empower well-being from water to wellness, meals to medication.
